author: Demosthenes
message: Small opportunities are often the beginning of great enterprises.
title: Thought of the day

author: Gail Sheehy
message: To be tested is good. The challenged life may be the best therapist.
title: Thought of the day

author: English proverb
message: Take heed: you do not find what you do not seek.
title: Thought of the day

author: Richard Bach
message: Happiness is the reward we get for living to the highest right we know.
title: Thought of the day
